c74object.name: sadam.udpSender
c74object.digest: Send data through the network using the UDP protocol
c74object.description:
sadam.udpSender
will send binary data (specified either by sending bytes directly to the object or by registering it to a binary stream represented by
sadam.stream) to a specified IP address on a specified port. Bytes are represented as numbers between 0 and 255 (0x00 and 0xFF, respectively).
This object was commissioned by Andrea Szigetvári and the Hungarian Computer Music Foundation.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: Various messages to set address, port etc.
inlet.description: Various messages to set address, port etc.

objarg.name: host
objarg.description: Sets the recipient address. It can be any valid IP address or domain name.

objarg.name: port
objarg.description: Sets the recipient port number. Valid port numbers are between 0 and 65535.

objarg.name: stream name
objarg.description:
Binds the object to a binary stream represented by
sadam.stream .

method.name: bind
method.digest: Without an argument, it will unregister all previously registered binary streams. If an argument is present, it will also register the stream with the given name to the object. If a stream is registered, each time the stream is cleared, its content will be sent out to the network.
method.description: Without an argument, it will unregister all previously registered binary streams. If an argument is present, it will also register the stream with the given name to the object. If a stream is registered, each time the stream is cleared, its content will be sent out to the network.

method.name: host
method.digest: Sets the host where the data should be sent. Can be any valid IP address or domain name.
method.description: Sets the host where the data should be sent. Can be any valid IP address or domain name.

method.name: int
method.digest: Sends the incoming number as a single byte to the network on the specified port to the specified host. The value is clipped to the region [0x00, 0xFF].
method.description: Sends the incoming number as a single byte to the network on the specified port to the specified host. The value is clipped to the region [0x00, 0xFF].

method.name: list
method.digest: Sends the incoming numbers as single bytes to the network on the specified port to the specified host. The values are clipped to the region [0x00, 0xFF].
method.description: Sends the incoming numbers as single bytes to the network on the specified port to the specified host. The values are clipped to the region [0x00, 0xFF].

method.name: port
method.digest: Sets the port on which the data should be sent. Valid range is from 0 to 65535.
method.description: Sets the port on which the data should be sent. Valid range is from 0 to 65535.

method.name: register
method.digest:
Registers the stream with the given name to the object. More than one stream can be registered to the same object. Unlike the message
bind
, it will not unregister other (already registered) streams.
method.description:
Registers the stream with the given name to the object. More than one stream can be registered to the same object. Unlike the message
bind
, it will not unregister other (already registered) streams.

method.name: unregister
method.digest: Unregisters the stream with the given name from the object.
method.description: Unregisters the stream with the given name from the object.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.digest: If non-zero, it will report activity to the Max window.
attribute.description: If non-zero, it will report activity to the Max window. Default value is (1).

example.caption: Send the 'Hello World' message byte-by-byte to a remote client.
